text: The Providence Bruins are an American professional ice hockey team that began playing in 1992. They currently play in the American Hockey League and are the farm team of the Boston Bruins of the NHL. They play their home games in Providence, Rhode Island at the Dunkin' Donuts Center. They have won 1 Calder Cup which was in 1998. ==Other websites== * Category:American Hockey League teams Category:Boston Bruins Category:Ice hockey teams in the United States Category:Providence, Rhode Island Category:1992 establishments in the United States Category:20th-century establishments in Rhode Island
title: Providence Bruins
